category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 6 (Protection of Human Rights of Employees)
contents: Article 6 (Protection of human rights of employees) The Sports Association fulfills its obligation to actively protect human rights to create a friendly working environment by guaranteeing the personal rights, health rights, and rest rights of all employees, including partners. [Moved from Article 11, previously Article 6] Article moved to Article 11 [November 7, 2019]
